alert.note: Alert for Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 19 at 11:46PM MST until February 20 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from 11 AM to 6 PM Sunday for gusty winds and low relative humidity values for fire weather zones 228...229 and 230 which includes Pueblo, Huerfano, and western Las Animas Counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 6 PM MST SUNDAY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 228...229 AND 230... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning which is in effect from 11 AM to 6 PM MST Sunday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 228...229 and 230. * Winds...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Huerfano County Including Walsenburg; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
